title: The Holocaust
description:
Product Description
GENOCIDE THE SYSTEMATIC SLAUGHTER OF MILLIONS A series of six programmes from the second world war, depicting Hitler's persecution of the Jewish race throughout Europe and his treatment of prisoners during the horrific events of the Holocaust. Containing much previously unseen footage.

THESE HISTORICAL DOCUMENTARIES CONTAIN MANY SCENES OF A VIOLENT AND DISTURBING NATURE. 

This box set contains the following six documentaries:
1.The Holocaust: The Yellow Star - The Persecution Of The Jews 1933-1945
2.The Holocaust: The Liberation of Auschwitz
3.The Holocaust: Majdanek - The Notorious Polish Concentration Camp
4.The Holocaust: Theresienstadt - The Truth Behind The Nazi Deception 1941-1945
5.The Holocaust: Ravensbruck and Buchenwald
6.The Holocaust: Dachau and Sachsenhausen
